FuncDef:
The ip route-static default-bfd command sets the global BFD parameters for a static route.
The undo ip route-static default-bfd command cancels the global BFD parameters of a static route. The ip route-static default-bfd command sets the global BFD parameters for a static route. The undo ip route-static default-bfd command cancels the global BFD parameters of a static route. By default, the minimum intervals at which BFD packets are received and sent is 1000 ms, and the detection time multiplier is 3.
CLIs: ip route-static default-bfd { min-rx-interval <min-rx-interval> | min-tx-interval <min-tx-interval> | detect-multiplier <multiplier> }

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the minimum interval at which BFD packets are received.
The value is an integer ranging from 3 to 1000, in milliseconds.

Specifies the minimum interval at which BFD packets are sent.
The value is an integer ranging from 3 to 1000, in milliseconds.

Specifies the detection time multiplier.
The value is an integer ranging from 3 to 50.

ExtraInfo: To modify BFD parameters for static routes, run the ip route-static default-bfd command.
